channel.title: RuneScape Old Engine (Build 377 and lower) interface editor
channel.description:
[B][URL=http://uppit.com/DBRJD1]Download here [JAR, Source And all files)] [/URL]
New stuff is: Automated window frame generation in 508 and 317 style(For 508 style, you need to move the bar manually) New engine sprite support(use ne_<spriteid>) Swing UI ;-) CS1 Editing inside the application
Usage info: When you click an create button, drag the mouse from the position till the size is correct Inventory sizes arent in pixels but in items
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/ok64vt.jpg[/img][/B]

item.title: RuneScape Old Engine (Build 377 and lower) interface editor
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“peterbjornx, post:9, topic:271298”]My code works, also this is very heavily based on stuff i did ages ago, also look at my mapper.[/quote]If I were you, what I’d do, is just whenever you have time go through all your code and patch up mistakes or find more efficient ways to do things.

The fact it works means you have solid code, but it can be optimized in places.

Just constructive criticism.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneScape Old Engine (Build 377 and lower) interface editor
item.dc:creator: @peterbjornx peterbjornx
item.description:
@peterbjornx wrote:

No, Truth: i leech designs from JAGeX posts, also did you notice in one of there Life At Jagex imgs they have a screen with a mapper?
Also the name andrew was already there when i extracted this file from the cache!

EDIT: Fixed the link, as this post was from a forum sometimes reffered to as google, it was in VB bbcode, that was my own post FYI
